18/12/2021.headline: England down and out in Adelaide as a dreary and one-sided Ashes battle slips away
18/12/2021.description: The tourists had their best session of the summer to start the third day of the second Test, but another dismal collapse left them on the brink of a 2-0 deficit in a disappointing Ashes battle, writes Russell Jackson.
18/12/2021.author: Russell Jackson

18/12/2021.headline: Experts urge NSW to reintroduce COVID restrictions after state sets new national record of cases
18/12/2021.description: Removing mandates on restrictions when infections are surging is "bizarre", say experts who are calling for the return of COVID-safe rules like mask wearing and QR check-ins before it's too late.
18/12/2021.author: Russell Jackson

18/12/2021.headline: Sport for these women means being part of a community, not just competition
18/12/2021.description: Once a week, the local tennis courts in Victoria's Brighton are packed with women playing futsal. But they don't want to compete, it's all about forming connections.
18/12/2021.author: Russell Jackson

18/12/2021.headline: Arizona's house prices jumped 35 per cent. That could be bad news for Australia
18/12/2021.description: House prices in the southern desert city of Phoenix, Arizona, have jumped an unprecedented 35 per cent in the year to June, forcing many out of the market entirely. It's a familiar story, but what happens next in the US could have a trickle-down effect on the average Australian household.
18/12/2021.author: Kathryn Diss

18/12/2021.headline: If this is coal's last hurrah, what's the plan for central Queensland?
18/12/2021.description: Queensland coal country will again be a focal point next election, and with growing job insecurity, distrust in major parties and Pauline Hanson and Clive Palmer still popular, things could get interesting.
18/12/2021.author: Nathan Morris

18/12/2021.headline: Itchy eyes and a strange weariness: This is what Omicron feels like, according to someone who's had it
18/12/2021.description: As scientists race to discover the distinguishing features of Omicron, Tshepo Mompei may be one of the few people in the world who can explain what the variant feels like compared to earlier strains.
18/12/2021.author: Tom Joyner

18/12/2021.headline: Volcanoes are destructive and explosive, but could their eruptions actually have benefits?
18/12/2021.description: The eruption on the Canary Island, La Palma, has captured the world's attention recently after causing thousands of residents to evacuate. But can a volcanic eruption have a positive impact? Scientists studying an active subantarctic volcano seem to think so.
18/12/2021.author: Alexandra Alvaro

18/12/2021.headline: With faith eroding and cynicism on the rise, my Christmases are sadder – and the world is poorer
18/12/2021.description: As Christianity recedes in Europe and other parts of the West, we're left with little transcendence, inherent pessimism and hopelessness – and our world is poorer for it, writes Stan Grant.
18/12/2021.author: Stan Grant

18/12/2021.headline: As Omicron surges and records fall, will we have to close borders again and increase restrictions?
18/12/2021.description: For the first time in almost two years Australia has swapped closed borders and double doughnuts for sell-out concerts and overseas and interstate flights. Yet with Omicron spreading, some say opening up feels like the coronavirus equivalent of a bungee jump, and this week we're standing on the ledge.
18/12/2021.author: Catherine Taylor

18/12/2021.headline: Top UK civil servant steps down from lockdown parties investigation after his own event is revealed
18/12/2021.description: Simon Case recuses himself from leading an investigation into alleged parties last year in government offices in breach of COVID-19 lockdowns after a Christmas event was held in his own office.
18/12/2021.author: Catherine Taylor

18/12/2021.headline: Explosion in Pakistan kills at least 15 after gas accumulates in sewer beneath bank
18/12/2021.description: Police spokesman Sohail Jokhio says the blast was apparently caused when something ignited gas that had built up in the sewer beneath a bank building in the Shershah neighbourhood of Karachi.
18/12/2021.author: Catherine Taylor

18/12/2021.headline: Nick D'Agostino scores late to earn Melbourne Victory share of spoils in A-League Men derby thriller
18/12/2021.description: Substitute Nick D'Agostino has the game's final say, snatching an equaliser in the 81st minute, before Melbourne City's Socceroo striker Jamie Maclaren is sent off in added time.
18/12/2021.author: Catherine Taylor

18/12/2021.headline: Melbourne Victory stays top, City jump into third after A-League Women's wins
18/12/2021.description: Melbourne Victory's championship title defence continues apace after a 3-2 defeat of Brisbane, while City jump into the top four after 3-1 over Adelaide.
18/12/2021.author: Samantha Lewis

18/12/2021.headline: 'This is clearly right for the common good': Perth cathedral throws open doors for COVID-19 vaccine clinic
18/12/2021.description: St Mary's Cathedral, in the Perth CBD, becomes the latest pop-up COVID-19 vaccination clinic in Western Australia to open in the hopes of attracting both parishioners and members of the public to receive the jab.
18/12/2021.author: Keane Bourke

18/12/2021.headline: First sneak peek at the weather forecast for Christmas day
18/12/2021.description: The Bureau of Meteorology has revealed its Christmas forecasts for the nation, so here's the first look at what you can expect for Christmas lunch.
18/12/2021.author: Kate Doyle

18/12/2021.headline: Australia takes charge of second Ashes Test with 282-run lead
18/12/2021.description: Australia do not enforce the follow on after England's middle order collapsed again, taking a commanding lead of 282 runs on day three at Adelaide Oval in the second Ashes Test.
18/12/2021.author: Simon Smale and Dean Bilton

19/12/2021.headline: Sydney defeat Wellington Phoenix to top A-League Women's ladder
19/12/2021.description: The Sky Blues' premiership title defence is on track, recording their third consecutive win in the A-League Women's competition on Sunday.
19/12/2021.author: Samantha Lewis

19/12/2021.headline: 120 kph winds lash Kimberley town, leaving businesses with hefty clean-up bill
19/12/2021.description: A storm has lashes the Kimberley town of Fitzroy Crossing, cutting power and causing hundreds of thousands of dollars damage to homes and businesses.
19/12/2021.author: Ted O'Connor

19/12/2021.headline: YouTuber Jake Paul beats UFC's Tyron Woodley in sixth-round KO
19/12/2021.description: Youtube star Jake Paul extends his perfect boxing record after flattening UFC champion Tyron Woodley in the sixth round of their Florida fight.
19/12/2021.author: Ted O'Connor

19/12/2021.headline: One dead, two people critical after severe storm hits Sydney's northern beaches
19/12/2021.description: One person is dead and two critically injured after a storm swept through Sydney's Northern Beaches.
19/12/2021.author: Ted O'Connor

19/12/2021.headline: South Australia records 80 new COVID-19 cases, including two media members at the Ashes
19/12/2021.description: Eighty new COVID-19 infections are recorded in South Australia, as the total number of active cases in the state rises to more than 300.
19/12/2021.author: Alice Dempster and Tom Fedorowytsch

19/12/2021.headline: Saturday Night Live airs without live audience, Charli XCX amid Omicron — but with Paul Rudd still hosting
19/12/2021.description: The Ant-Man star returns to Studio 8H as host for the fifth time and for the final show of 2021.
19/12/2021.author: Alice Dempster and Tom Fedorowytsch

19/12/2021.headline: Aussie moguls star Anthony wins World Cup double in preparation for Beijing Winter Olympics
19/12/2021.description: Aussie moguls star Jakara Anthony completes magnificent World Cup double at  Alpe d'Huez on another successful day for Australia's Winter Olympians.
19/12/2021.author: Alice Dempster and Tom Fedorowytsch

19/12/2021.headline: Call put out for tradies to come work on Australia's Antarctic bases
19/12/2021.description: The Australian Antarctic Program is looking for 200 people to fill 24 roles across its Antarctic research stations at Mawson, Davis and Casey, as well as on Macquarie Island.
19/12/2021.author: Alice Dempster and Tom Fedorowytsch

19/12/2021.headline: Aussie darts dad through to next round of world championships, awaits son's results
19/12/2021.description: Australian dad Ray Smith reaches the second round of the world darts championships, watched on by fellow competitor and son, Ky, who competes on Sunday.
19/12/2021.author: Alice Dempster and Tom Fedorowytsch

19/12/2021.headline: NASA rover makes surprising geological discoveries on Mars
19/12/2021.description: Scientists discover the Mars bedrock the Perseverance Rover has been driving on likely formed from red-hot magma, as well as discovering rocks which have interacted with water.
19/12/2021.author: Alice Dempster and Tom Fedorowytsch

19/12/2021.headline: Live: Australia sets England massive target late on day four of second Ashes Test in Adelaide
19/12/2021.description: Australia has set England a monstrous 468 runs to win the second Ashes Test at Adelaide Oval. Follow the action live.
19/12/2021.author: Simon Smale and Dean Bilton

19/12/2021.headline: Ashes broadcast crew members test positive for COVID-19 in Adelaide
19/12/2021.description: Two members of the media teams covering the Ashes Test in Adelaide test positive for COVID-19.
19/12/2021.author: Patrick Martin and Alice Dempster

19/12/2021.headline: Arrest made over alleged racist abuse of Arsenal substitutes at Leeds
19/12/2021.description: Leeds United release a statement over an alleged incident in their loss to Arsenal, warning anyone using racist language will be banned from Elland Road for life.
19/12/2021.author: Patrick Martin and Alice Dempster

19/12/2021.headline: Island 'levelled', provinces cut off and without power and at least 31 dead after Typhoon Rai hits Philippines
19/12/2021.description: Official plead for food, water, temporary shelter, fuel and medical supplies after an island of about 180,000 is "levelled" and cut off, with no power or communication lines.
19/12/2021.author: Patrick Martin and Alice Dempster

19/12/2021.headline: 'We are very concerned': Nine new cases recorded in the NT, Ali Curung to enter immediate lockdown
19/12/2021.description: Health Minister Natasha Fyles says she is "very concerned" about the Northern Territory's COVID outbreak as case numbers in Tennant Creek — where vaccination rates remain low — continue to rise and another remote community has been plunged into lockdown.
19/12/2021.author: Roxanne Fitzgerald

19/12/2021.headline: Sixth child dies after jumping castle tragedy, survivor pays tribute to classmates
19/12/2021.description: A sixth child injured during Thursday's jumping castle tragedy in Tasmania dies on the day the site is visited by a survivor who pays tribute to his classmates.
19/12/2021.author: James Dunlevie, Adam Langenberg, and Susan Oong

19/12/2021.headline: Olympian Jess Fox discusses her new documentary that details her rocky Tokyo journey
19/12/2021.description: Olympic gold medallist Jess Fox is no stranger to rough waters. In a new documentary, the slalom canoeist opens up about her rocky Tokyo journey and what comes next after achieving her dreams.
19/12/2021.author: James Dunlevie, Adam Langenberg, and Susan Oong

19/12/2021.headline: Caitlin attaches spyware to funnel-web spiders to work out when they are a high risk to humans
19/12/2021.description: To investigate the movements of the Sydney funnel-web spider UNSW researcher Caitlin Creak attaches a tracking device with superglue to their bodies. But not without gassing them first for her own safety.
19/12/2021.author: James Dunlevie, Adam Langenberg, and Susan Oong

19/12/2021.headline: UK Brexit Minister quits as new COVID rules spark anger
19/12/2021.description: A senior member of Prime Minister Boris Johnson's cabinet resigns, adding to a sense of disarray within a government that has faced rebellion from its own party members and voters this week.
19/12/2021.author: James Dunlevie, Adam Langenberg, and Susan Oong

19/12/2021.headline: Omicron may become dominant COVID strain in Queensland within days, CHO says
19/12/2021.description: Queensland records 34 new locally acquired COVID cases, with the Chief Health Officer saying Omicron could become the dominant variant within days.
19/12/2021.author: James Dunlevie, Adam Langenberg, and Susan Oong

19/12/2021.headline: 'Just not as powerful': Tiger Woods returns to golf with son Charlie after horror car crash
19/12/2021.description: Tiger Woods returns to the greens for the first time since his February car crash, and he does it with son Charlie by his side.
19/12/2021.author: James Dunlevie, Adam Langenberg, and Susan Oong

19/12/2021.headline: 'I want to be out on country at least one last time': Vincent's bucket list
19/12/2021.description: In his dreams, Vincent can walk to the shops and do his gardening. When he wakes up, he can't move. With no idea how long he has left, his community is rushing to his side to help him tick off his bucket list.
19/12/2021.author: Larissa Waterson

19/12/2021.headline: 'A very difficult position': Two adults and two children die as light plane crashes near Brisbane
19/12/2021.description: Two men and two children have been killed after a light plane crashed into the sea off Redcliffe, north-east of Brisbane, Queensland police say.
19/12/2021.author: Larissa Waterson

19/12/2021.headline: Hit and run on dark road leaves 27-year-old pedestrian dead in Darwin's northern suburbs
19/12/2021.description: Northern Territory Police are investigating a fatal hit and run on a dark and narrow road in Darwin's northern suburbs overnight.
19/12/2021.author: Roxanne Fitzgerald

19/12/2021.headline: London declares COVID-19 a major incident, alarmed ministers tighten restrictions across Europe
19/12/2021.description: The Netherlands bans Christmas gatherings, Paris cancels its New Year's Eve fireworks, and London declares COVID-19 a major incident as Europe battles the "lightning" spread of the Omicron variant.
19/12/2021.author: Roxanne Fitzgerald

19/12/2021.headline: 'It will kill us': Hospitality sector calls for overhaul of close contact rules as staff, customers isolate
19/12/2021.description: Business owners say the rules force their staff members into quarantine and are hurting the hospitality industry just as much as customers cancelling on plans amid the latest COVID-19 outbreak.
19/12/2021.author: Heath Parkes-Hupton

19/12/2021.headline: Are you due for your COVID booster? Here's how you can get it in Queensland
19/12/2021.description: The vaccine booster doses have been fast-tracked in Australia to be available five months after your second vaccination. Here's how to get it and what you need to know.
19/12/2021.author: Kym Agius

19/12/2021.headline: How to deal with Christmas if your kids have too many toys
19/12/2021.description: Apart from environmental concerns, having lots of toys can negatively impact children as well as parents and carers. Here are some ideas for dealing with existing toys, as well as the upcoming influx of new ones, write Louise Grimmer and Martin Grimmer.
19/12/2021.author: Kym Agius

19/12/2021.headline: With more of us getting back on planes, can aviation go greener?
19/12/2021.description: Achieving a net zero aviation sector will require a huge collaborative effort from industry and government — and consumers can also play their part, write Emma Rachel Whittlesea and Tim Ryley.
19/12/2021.author: Kym Agius

19/12/2021.headline: Women giving birth 'on the side of the road' as hospital struggles to cater to growing community
19/12/2021.description: Staff push for funding boost as hundreds of pregnant women turned away from Werribee Mercy Hospital every year.
19/12/2021.author: Margaret Paul

19/12/2021.headline: This award-winning actor escaped with his kids amid gunfire. This is the next chapter of his life
19/12/2021.description: Four months after fleeing their home in Afghanistan with just a few suitcases, Faridullah Mohibi and his family are slowly rebuilding their lives, but standing in their way is the need to find a house.
19/12/2021.author: Harriet Tatham

19/12/2021.headline: How two US veterans launched an audacious plot to steal weapons from under Army chiefs' noses
19/12/2021.description: Packed with rifles and explosives, the SUV hurtled down a Florida interstate beneath bright blue autumn skies. What happened next exposed a bid to steal military weapons and equipment from one of the US Army's biggest bases.
19/12/2021.author: Harriet Tatham

19/12/2021.headline: Pokies manufacturer Aristocrat wants a new way to get your money — through your phone
19/12/2021.description: Aristocrat Leisure is spending $5 billion to buy a company specialising in a controversial type of online gaming, and it has anti-gambling campaigners worried.
19/12/2021.author: Daniel Ziffer

19/12/2021.headline: 'I feel lucky': A trainee Afghan fighter pilot has found support in Australia but fears for those left behind
19/12/2021.description: In August, trainee fighter pilot Ms Rajabi fled Kabul in fear for her life. After a "horrifying" journey to get here, she is settling in Adelaide and has even taken her first flight.
19/12/2021.author: Tracey Shelton and Joshua Boscaini

19/12/2021.headline: Despite COVID lockdowns, road fatalities rose this year. Experts fear a new road toll plan isn't going to work
19/12/2021.description: Transport Minister Barnaby Joyce has been urged to overhaul the government's planned road toll strategy for the next decade, as motoring and health experts warn it is set to fail.
19/12/2021.author: Jake Evans

19/12/2021.headline: 'Nowadays, there is no age limit': At just 15, Melbourne teenager Rudra has authored a scientific article
19/12/2021.description: Rudra started assisting Swinburne University researchers when he was in grade six. Three years later, he has just co-authored a scientific article alongside a leading astronomer.
19/12/2021.author: Jacqueline Howard

19/12/2021.headline: 2021 was a rough year for Australian women in politics. Here's what it was like for female leaders overseas
19/12/2021.description: While women overseas are seemingly smashing through glass ceilings to hold top office, Australia is stagnating when it comes to representation in our federal parliament. So what's going on?
19/12/2021.author: Lucy Sweeney

19/12/2021.headline: Will a magic pudding budget sway voters ahead of 2022 election?
19/12/2021.description: The federal government seems ready to open up the vaults in a bid for re-election next year, but there's likely to be some drastic action needed after that, writes business editor Ian Verrender.
19/12/2021.author: Ian Verrender

19/12/2021.headline: COVID cases are climbing as Christmas gets closer. Here's how to reduce the risks
19/12/2021.description: As the holiday season begins, many of us are looking forward to switching off and spending time with family and friends. To keep things COVID-safe over the festive season, here's what the experts recommend.
19/12/2021.author: Olivia Willis

19/12/2021.headline: NSW Premier reveals major cabinet reshuffle
19/12/2021.description: Dominic Perrottet appoints nine first-time ministers, dumps MPs from their portfolios and creates new ministries as he establishes his team to take to the 2023 state election.
19/12/2021.author: Ashleigh Raper

19/12/2021.headline: Queen guitarist issues vaccination plea as he reveals COVID diagnosis
19/12/2021.description: The musician and astrophysicist reveals he is recovering from COVID-19, using a message to fans to encourage them to be vaccinated.
19/12/2021.author: Yara Murray-Atfield

19/12/2021.headline: Macarthur stays top of A-League Men table, Sydney records first win
19/12/2021.description: Macarthur FC fights back from a goal down with 10 players to deliver a backs-to-the-wall 2-1 win over the Newcastle Jets in the A-League Men competition.
19/12/2021.author: Yara Murray-Atfield

19/12/2021.headline: Torrential rains hit Malaysia, floods drive more than 21,000 from their homes
19/12/2021.description: Flooding closes dozens of roads and disrupts shipping in the country's most populous region.
19/12/2021.author: Yara Murray-Atfield

19/12/2021.headline: 'Never seen anything like it': One dead, two people critical after severe storm hits Sydney
19/12/2021.description: A severe weather event lasting minutes leaves a trail of destruction and power outages across Sydney's northern beaches with one woman dead and two others seriously injured.
19/12/2021.author: Ted O'Connor

20/12/2021.headline: As another border opens, a daughter says a last goodbye and a grandmother says her first hello
20/12/2021.description: Tears of joy, a warm embrace after many months apart and grandchildren held for the first time: These were the scenes at airports hours after the biggest change to the Northern Territory's borders came into effect since the pandemic began.
20/12/2021.author: Roxanne Fitzgerald and Housnia Shams

20/12/2021.headline: Expansion AFLW clubs able to poach rival players under new rules
20/12/2021.description: AFLW expansion clubs Essendon, Hawthorn, Port Adelaide and Sydney are eyeing off rivals' elite talent as their inaugural squads begin to take shape.
20/12/2021.author: Roxanne Fitzgerald and Housnia Shams

20/12/2021.headline: Perth could be in for its hottest Christmas in more than half a century. Here's why
20/12/2021.description: Perth is set to sizzle through the hottest Christmas in 53 years, with temperatures set to soar past 40 degrees, sparking heatwave warnings.
20/12/2021.author: Tyne Logan

20/12/2021.headline: The Loop: Thousands to leave Sydney, Melbourne, National Cabinet calls emergency meeting, and you better croc-o-dial Mick Dundee
20/12/2021.description: Your quick wrap-up of the news you need to know about.
20/12/2021.author: Bridget Judd

20/12/2021.headline: A-League Women's Wrap: Celebrating unsung heroes while doubts linger over double-headers
20/12/2021.description: It's time to celebrate the game-changers and history-makers, but questions linger over Perth Glory's pandemic-hit season.
20/12/2021.author: Samantha Lewis

20/12/2021.headline: Remote community goes almost five days without internet, leaving residents scrambling for food, fuel
20/12/2021.description: Residents of Maningrida went almost five days without mobile phone coverage before service was restored this afternoon, leaving residents struggling to buy essentials such as food and fuel.
20/12/2021.author: Mikaela Simpson

20/12/2021.headline: High schooler charged after fellow student given drug-laced lollipop
20/12/2021.description: The boy has been expelled after giving another student drugs during the school day.
20/12/2021.author: Georgia Loney

20/12/2021.headline: Aussie teen Ky Smith knocked out of darts world championships, but dad Ray through to next round
20/12/2021.description: Aussie Ky Smith can't match dad Ray's feat at the darts world championships, knocked out in the first round.
20/12/2021.author: Georgia Loney

20/12/2021.headline: Pilots 'encouraged to assess weather in flight', report finds
20/12/2021.description: The Australian Transport Safety Bureau's final report into the 2018 light plane crash that claimed the life of pilot Nikita Walker found she probably experienced reduced visibility during a flight to collect passengers from Bathurst Harbour in Tasmania's south-west wilderness.
20/12/2021.author: Alexandra Humphries

20/12/2021.headline: What is going on with Ghislaine Maxwell's sex abuse trial?
20/12/2021.description: With just days left before a verdict is expected, here is a recap on what has happened during one of the United State's highest-profile trials of 2021.
20/12/2021.author: Alexandra Humphries

20/12/2021.headline: 'We feel safer': Parents of vulnerable Canberra children welcome vaccination bookings
20/12/2021.description: Children aged five to 11 can now book in for a COVID-19 vaccination through an ACT government clinic, with appointments commencing from January 10 next year. For some families, the announcement brings peace of mind.
20/12/2021.author: Elizabeth Byrne and Selby Stewart

20/12/2021.headline: Man who murdered housemate over dispute about internet usage to spend 20 years behind bars
20/12/2021.description: A man guilty of murdering his housemate by beating him to death with a bicycle, wheelie bin and baseball bat in a dispute over an internet connection will spend at least 20 years behind bars.
20/12/2021.author: Sarah Mullins

20/12/2021.headline: NSW criticised for 'premature' easing of restrictions that could be fatal for vulnerable residents
20/12/2021.description: A molecular biologist who lives with motor neuron disease criticises the government's handling of the latest COVID outbreak, saying it could kill a vulnerable person like himself.
20/12/2021.author: Ainslie Drewitt-Smith

20/12/2021.headline: Sniper-style assassination of former WA bikie boss ends in 20-year jail sentence
20/12/2021.description: The former soldier who murdered a notorious Perth bikie in a sniper-style attack at the Perth Motorplex avoids a life jail term after promising to testify against the alleged mastermind of the killing.
20/12/2021.author: Joanna Menagh

20/12/2021.headline: Leftist millennial Gabriel Boric wins Chile election
20/12/2021.description: A leftist millennial who rose to prominence during anti-government protests is elected Chile's next president after a bruising campaign against a candidate likened to Donald Trump.
20/12/2021.author: Joanna Menagh

20/12/2021.headline: Why Adam Reynolds' true Broncos legacy will not be on the field
20/12/2021.description: On the field, Adam Reynolds is still one of the best halfbacks in the NRL, but his greatest value to the Broncos may not be felt for years to come.
20/12/2021.author: Joanna Menagh

20/12/2021.headline: 'Almost able to smell his breath': Fishers in awe as crocodile attacks shark in North Queensland river
20/12/2021.description: Does it get any more North Queensland than this? Watch the moment "Boofhead" the crocodile steals dinner — a small shark — from a fisherman in Proserpine.
20/12/2021.author: Angel Parsons

20/12/2021.headline: Former NSW Water Minister's son among ADF members with COVID-19 at army barracks
20/12/2021.description: Melinda Pavey's son is one of four ADF members to test positive to COVID-19 at an army barracks in the Upper Hunter.
20/12/2021.author: Claudia Jambor

20/12/2021.headline: Sleep apnoea going undiagnosed as current tests miss 'the full story', study finds
20/12/2021.description: A new sleep tracker reveals up to 50 per cent of people with mild or moderate sleep apnoea could be misdiagnosed under current clinical testing, researchers say.
20/12/2021.author: Gillian Aeria

20/12/2021.headline: Gallen predicts early KO for footy fight night
20/12/2021.description: Paul Gallen is adamant Darcy Lussick is out of his depth and vows to prove it when the two meet in the ring on Wednesday night.
20/12/2021.author: Gillian Aeria

20/12/2021.headline: As we learn more about Omicron, some experts say it's time to tap the brakes on living with COVID
20/12/2021.description: Three infectious diseases experts call for a return to mask wearing and caps on crowds while authorities learn more about the severity of the Omicron variant. But one infectious diseases physician warns the mandates could erode compliance.
20/12/2021.author: Gillian Aeria

20/12/2021.headline: Live: Australia just three wickets away from victory on day five in Adelaide
20/12/2021.description: Australia is on the precipice of claiming a 2-0 Ashes series lead, with England needing a miracle to stave off defeat at Adelaide Oval. Follow the action live.
20/12/2021.author: Simon Smale and Dean Bilton

20/12/2021.headline: Victoria and New South Wales to lose people to other states after COVID lockdowns
20/12/2021.description: New population data forecasts that Victoria and New South Wales will be the only states not to benefit from interstate migration over the next year, as Queensland and other states welcome more new residents.
20/12/2021.author: Georgia Hitch

20/12/2021.headline: Aussie Molly Taylor creates motorsport history with inaugural Extreme E title
20/12/2021.description: Australian Molly Taylor creates history after winning the first Extreme E title with Nico Rosberg's team.
20/12/2021.author: Georgia Hitch

20/12/2021.headline: Five SA COVID-19 patients in hospital as 105 new cases reported in state
20/12/2021.description: South Australia records 105 new cases of COVID-19, a record number for one day. There are now five people in hospital with the virus and 406 active cases, also a record. SA Health has also identified five new exposure sites.
20/12/2021.author: Eugene Boisvert and Alice Dempster

20/12/2021.headline: Long delays, queues tipped at Queensland COVID testing clinics as cases rise, Christmas nears
20/12/2021.description: Tens of thousands of people have already flooded into Queensland and numbers are expected to spike this week in the lead up to Christmas, with concerns COVID testing facilities may not be able to cope with the demand.
20/12/2021.author: Alex Brewster

20/12/2021.headline: There are echoes of the past in WA's COVID border lockout
20/12/2021.description: After closing itself off for nearly two years of the pandemic, Western Australia seems finally ready to reopen — although its long-harboured secessionist dreams will likely never die, writes David Lee.
20/12/2021.author: Alex Brewster

20/12/2021.headline: Lychee market ripe for family-run businesses as rain showers farmers with good fortune
20/12/2021.description: Good rainfall has led to bumper lychee crops in Central Queensland this year and a boost in the quality and size of the popular tropical fruit just in time for Christmas.
20/12/2021.author: Ashleigh Bagshaw

20/12/2021.headline: 'I'm happy and hungry': Sydney's Wayside Chapel hosts special 'mob lunch' after two years of cancelled Christmases
20/12/2021.description: For the first time since the pandemic began, Sydney's Wayside Chapel is able to host its famous Christmas celebrations again. Part of the festivities include a special 'mob lunch' for the many homeless Indigenous people who will be spending the holiday season on the streets.
20/12/2021.author: Nakari Thorpe

20/12/2021.headline: Sacrifices now could avoid Christmas disaster as Omicron rages in community
20/12/2021.description: If you're thinking about heading out tonight, health experts say skipping that social event could save your family from COVID-19 this Christmas.
20/12/2021.author: Heath Parkes-Hupton

20/12/2021.headline: Rapid antigen tests for COVID are being used at Christmas lunches across Australia. Should they be free?
20/12/2021.description: As COVID-19 cases rise across Australia and the threat of the Omicron variant looms over Christmas celebrations scheduled for the days ahead, some believe making rapid antigen tests free would help curb rising infections.
20/12/2021.author: Prianka Srinivasan and Sian Johnson

20/12/2021.headline: Ally Colquitt knows the rehabilitative potential of reading, which gave her purpose and meaning in prison
20/12/2021.description: While incarcerated from the end of 2015 to 2017, Ally Colquitt became completely absorbed in the world of reading. Now, she is helping other women in prison to rehabilitate through books.
20/12/2021.author: Prianka Srinivasan and Sian Johnson

20/12/2021.headline: From Bond’s sultry lover to a Wes Anderson muse: Léa Seydoux on being typecast
20/12/2021.description: The French actor steals the show in The French Dispatch, mixing vulnerability with humour as a prison guard-turned-artist's model; it's just the latest in a long line of sultry, enigmatic heartbreakers she has played.
20/12/2021.author: Annabel Brady-Brown

20/12/2021.headline: Throshni accepted help from the government to get home to her family. Now she’s regretting the decision
20/12/2021.description: More than 180 Australians will be spending Christmas in COVID-19 quarantine facilities, after arriving on repatriation flights from southern Africa last week.
20/12/2021.author: Mary Lloyd and Penny Timms

20/12/2021.headline: Fake meat inquiry may ask vegan food producers to drop labels like 'beef' from packaging
20/12/2021.description: Plant-based food producers may be forced to drop terms including 'beef' and 'sausage' — as well as any images of animals — from their packaging, according to the chair of a Senate inquiry into food labelling.
20/12/2021.author: Nassim Khadem

20/12/2021.headline: Is it possible to be content renting long-term? This is what Australia can learn from housing around the world
20/12/2021.description: Imagine having capped rent increases, long-term leases and eviction security that helped make your rented property feel like your own home. This is what other countries are doing to help address the housing crisis.
20/12/2021.author: Annika Burgess

20/12/2021.headline: A space capsule landed in the Australian outback in 2019, carrying 'a perfect window into the building blocks of the solar system'
20/12/2021.description: Just over a year ago, a space capsule carrying a very precious cargo from an asteroid touched down in the South Australian outback. Now the first results are back.
20/12/2021.author: Genelle Weule

20/12/2021.headline: Kevin Coombs' life changed the moment he heard the click of the gun
20/12/2021.description: After a traumatic childhood accident, Kevin Coombs defied the odds and survived, going on to become the first Indigenous Australian Paralympian.
20/12/2021.author: Sophie Kesteven and Amanda Smith

20/12/2021.headline: Death toll from Philippines typhoon surges to 375
20/12/2021.description: The death toll from Typhoon Rai rises to 375, making it one of the deadliest typhoons to have struck the South-East Asian nation.
20/12/2021.author: Sophie Kesteven and Amanda Smith

20/12/2021.headline: Flooding kills eight in Malaysia as rescue crews struggle to keep up with calls for help
20/12/2021.description: Selangor police report eight people have been found dead, as the government faces criticism for slow rescue operations.
20/12/2021.author: Sophie Kesteven and Amanda Smith

20/12/2021.headline: Pro-Beijing candidates dominate Hong Kong election amid low voter turnout
20/12/2021.description: Candidates loyal to China win a majority of seats in the city's Legislative Council, as voter turnout plummets to the lowest since the British handed Hong Kong over to China in 1997.
20/12/2021.author: Sophie Kesteven and Amanda Smith

20/12/2021.headline: Rafael Nadal tests positive for COVID-19 after Abu Dhabi event
20/12/2021.description: Rafael Nadal tests positive for COVID-19 upon arrival in Spain after making his comeback from injury in an exhibition event in Abu Dhabi last week.
20/12/2021.author: Sophie Kesteven and Amanda Smith

20/12/2021.headline: England was brave, but selecting a team to avoid an Ashes drubbing is easier said than done
20/12/2021.description: Australia won the Adelaide Test by 275 runs to take a 2-0 lead in the Ashes, and for all England’s misfires at the selection table, it is difficult to see drastic improvement from their alternatives.
20/12/2021.author: Russell Jackson

20/12/2021.headline: NRL agrees to new five-year broadcast deal with Nine
20/12/2021.description: NRL secures a new bumper five-year deal with Nine, while expansion to an 18th team is still possible before 2028.
20/12/2021.author: Russell Jackson

20/12/2021.headline: Perth Glory's A-League seasons still in doubt despite fixture changes
20/12/2021.description: Perth Glory are hopeful that both their men's and women's seasons will not be too heavily affected by border closures as the men's team plan to charter a flight back to Western Australia.
20/12/2021.author: Russell Jackson

20/12/2021.headline: WA's environment watchdog failed to properly assess Woodside's $16.5b Scarborough gas development, court told
20/12/2021.description: Western Australia's environment watchdog failed to properly assess the biggest oil and gas development to be built in Australia in a decade, the WA Supreme Court has been told.
20/12/2021.author: David Weber

20/12/2021.headline: NRL stands down Melbourne forward Tui Kamikamica after assault charge
20/12/2021.description: Melbourne prop Tui Kamikamica has been cleared to return to training but will remain subject to the NRL no-fault stand-down policy as he prepares to fight an assault charge.
20/12/2021.author: David Weber

20/12/2021.headline: 'China will fight to the finish': Foreign Minister warns US over Taiwan support
20/12/2021.description: In a speech posted on a ministerial website, Foreign Minister, Wang Yi, says there is "no harm" in competition, but that it should be "positive", accusing the United States and others of trying to "use Taiwan to control China".
20/12/2021.author: David Weber

20/12/2021.headline: AFL clubs to get two practice matches as 2022 pre-season schedule released
20/12/2021.description: AFL locks in its 2022 pre-season schedule with each club getting two hit-outs against league opponents before the home-and-away season begins.
20/12/2021.author: David Weber

21/12/2021.headline: Queensland's quarantine rules have changed. Here's what you need to know
21/12/2021.description: Quarantine rules are easing in Queensland, despite its rapidly-growing COVID-19 outbreak. Here's what you need to know.
21/12/2021.author: Ciara Jones

21/12/2021.headline: WNBL coach, referee banned for exchanging footage of rival club's training session
21/12/2021.description: Opals' Asia Cup coach Paul Goriss is banned for a month and referee Simon Cosier axed for the rest of the WNBL season after the pair exchanged confidential footage of a rival club's training session.
21/12/2021.author: Ciara Jones

21/12/2021.headline: The Loop: We're not going back to lockdowns, Chris Noth dropped amid sexual assault claims and stealing a bridge is... a bridge too far
21/12/2021.description: Your quick wrap-up of the news you need to know about.
21/12/2021.author: Bridget Judd

21/12/2021.headline: 'Massive pressure': NSW COVID testing sites turn people away amid equipment shortages
21/12/2021.description: NSW Health Minister Brad Hazzard has conceded the state's COVID-19 testing system is under "massive pressure" as clinics turn people away and wait times blow out.
21/12/2021.author: Heath Parkes-Hupton

21/12/2021.headline: Modelling outdated with advent of Omicron, doctors say, amid warnings harsher WA restrictions may be needed
21/12/2021.description: Modelling done to determine WA's reopening strategy is already outdated thanks to Omicron, doctors say, and harsher restrictions could be on the cards.
21/12/2021.author: James Carmody

21/12/2021.headline: 'Excluded under white man's law': Traditional owners challenge nuclear waste dump
21/12/2021.description: Traditional owners on South Australia's Eyre Peninsula formally lodge a legal challenge to a nuclear waste dump in the region.
21/12/2021.author: Declan Gooch, Patrick Martin, and Gillian Aeria

21/12/2021.headline: Government contractor dies after car breaks down in searing heat in remote WA
21/12/2021.description: Police say two men tried to walk 30 kilometres to a ranger station, but one, in his 20s, deteriorated rapidly and died that day.
21/12/2021.author: Erin Parke

21/12/2021.headline: Boland added to squad for Boxing Day Test as Australia sweats on Hazlewood's fitness
21/12/2021.description: Victorian Scott Boland is added to Australia's squad for the Boxing Day Ashes Test in Melbourne amid concerns over the fitness of some of the team's current fast bowlers.
21/12/2021.author: Erin Parke

21/12/2021.headline: Driver impaired by 'lethal' drug dose before crash that killed Home and Away star
21/12/2021.description: The NSW coroner finds the 50-year-old man responsible for the 2017 crash that killed Jessica Falkholt and her family had consumed a cocktail of anti-depressants.
21/12/2021.author: Tim Fernandez

21/12/2021.headline: American ex-priest in Timor-Leste guilty of sex abuse, sentenced to 12 years in prison
21/12/2021.description: In the first case of its kind in the staunchly Catholic nation, 84-year-old Richard Daschbach was sentenced on Tuesday, found guilty of sexually abusing orphaned and disadvantaged young girls under his care.
21/12/2021.author: Tim Fernandez

21/12/2021.headline: Fresher for longer, new technology opens export door for Aussie milk
21/12/2021.description: World-first technology to extend the life of raw milk to export it straight from the cow to South-East Asia is being pitched as an exciting opportunity for Australian dairy farmers.
21/12/2021.author: Warwick Long

21/12/2021.headline: Tim Gunn, who sparked southern Tasmania's three-day lockdown, jailed for five months
21/12/2021.description: A New South Wales man who caused southern Tasmania to be sent into a snap three-day lockdown in October has been sentenced in the Hobart Magistrates' Court.
21/12/2021.author: Lucy MacDonald

21/12/2021.headline: Masks return indoors as ACT tries to slow Omicron spread
21/12/2021.description: Canberrans will again have to wear masks indoor as the ACT tightens restrictions in a bid to slow the spread of the COVID-19 Omicron variant.
21/12/2021.author: Selby Stewart

21/12/2021.headline: Julie was admitted to a psych ward for treatment. Instead, she came out more traumatised
21/12/2021.description: The Victorian government announces the creation of a specialist women's mental health service after hearing stories of abuse and trauma.
21/12/2021.author: Charmayne Allison, Courtney Howe, and Richard Willingham

21/12/2021.headline: Australian bronze medal boxer Harry Garside plans to go pro
21/12/2021.description: After winning over the Australian public during the Tokyo Olympics, boxer Harry Garside now plans to do it again as he enters the professional circuit.
21/12/2021.author: Charmayne Allison, Courtney Howe, and Richard Willingham

21/12/2021.headline: Three men who fled Tennant Creek lockdown and drove to Alice Springs fined by police
21/12/2021.description: Police locate one of the men two days after the trio allegedly left the locked-down Tennant Creek on Saturday morning to make the 500 kilometre drive to Alice Springs.
21/12/2021.author: Charmayne Allison, Courtney Howe, and Richard Willingham

21/12/2021.headline: NRL, RLPA circling new bargaining agreement following broadcast windfall
21/12/2021.description: The role of the integrity unit, a CBA for NRLW players and possible changes to the transfer system will all be on the RLPA'a agenda.
21/12/2021.author: Charmayne Allison, Courtney Howe, and Richard Willingham

21/12/2021.headline: Concussed BMX Olympian Saya Sakakibara bounces back with first national title
21/12/2021.description: Australian BMX star Saya Sakakibara storms back from her Tokyo Olympics injury to win the national elite title for the first time.
21/12/2021.author: Charmayne Allison, Courtney Howe, and Richard Willingham

21/12/2021.headline: Omicron cases confirmed in COVID-positive travellers in town near Uluru, as NT records 11 new local cases
21/12/2021.description: Testing has confirmed two men who arrived in Yulara on a flight from Brisbane have the Omicron strain of the virus, while nine of the new local cases recorded today are linked to Tennant Creek.
21/12/2021.author: Samantha Dick

21/12/2021.headline: Police probe 'insider knowledge' in $1m silver heist
21/12/2021.description: Detectives are investigating whether "insider knowledge" was used to steal $1 million worth of silver bullion from a delivery truck on Sydney's outskirts last month.
21/12/2021.author: Alison Xiao

21/12/2021.headline: Cronulla are betting their NRL rise on Nicho Hynes
21/12/2021.description: Nicho Hynes is talented enough to overcome the curse of leaving the Melbourne Storm. Cronulla are counting on it.
21/12/2021.author: Alison Xiao

21/12/2021.headline: 'They have to shorten the dose': Experts back state leaders' push for earlier booster access
21/12/2021.description: State leaders push the Australian government to shorten the interval between second and third COVID-19 vaccine doses to combat the rapid spread of the Omicron variant.
21/12/2021.author: Yara Murray-Atfield

21/12/2021.headline: 'Thousands of cases' in January forecast as Queensland brings forward quarantine rule changes
21/12/2021.description: Queensland records 86 new cases of COVID-19 as authorities announce shorter quarantine and isolation periods for close and casual contacts from tomorrow.
21/12/2021.author: Yara Murray-Atfield

21/12/2021.headline: Morrison tips more indoor mask use as Omicron variant spreads
21/12/2021.description: The Prime Minister says he will present strong recommendations for ongoing mask use indoors at a meeting of state and territory leaders tomorrow, as young people are warned the Omicron variant is spreading more rapidly among that age group.
21/12/2021.author: Claudia Long

21/12/2021.headline: Queensland council awards $15m in contracts to one organisation
21/12/2021.description: The Moreton Bay Region Industry and Tourism Ltd, who was engaged by council to organise festivals and events, has previously been cleared of wrongdoing by the state's corruption watchdog.
21/12/2021.author: Rory Callinan

21/12/2021.headline: Why this South African dentist set up shop in the Queensland outback
21/12/2021.description: Cloncurry is rolling out the welcome mat for its first dentist in 16 years. Until now, residents have dealt the best they could with toothaches by using "interesting" home remedies or travelling long distances to see a doctor.
21/12/2021.author: Larissa Waterson and Zara Margolis

21/12/2021.headline: 'I'm desperately worried': Alanna faces a four-hour trip to take a COVID-19 test
21/12/2021.description: With Tasmania open to vaccinated travellers from interstate, some residents are concerned about the increased demand on the state's testing system and what impact that will have on the health system more broadly.
21/12/2021.author: Kate Ainsworth

21/12/2021.headline: Cardboardeaux, bag-in-box, and goon bag: Why Australia’s love affair with boxed wine endures
21/12/2021.description: Boxed wine is one of Australia's most extraordinary contributions to the wine industry, and it's come a long way from the clothesline, writes Adele Wessell.
21/12/2021.author: Kate Ainsworth

21/12/2021.headline: After years of silence, it felt like women made history this year. But what happens next?
21/12/2021.description: It has been a momentous year in Australia as the #MeToo movement made its way across the globe and into Australian federal politics. But will 2021 result in permanent change, asks Blair Williams.
21/12/2021.author: Kate Ainsworth

21/12/2021.headline: No small talk: 8yo Gold Coast girl's TED Talk is world's biggest hit of 2021
21/12/2021.description: Molly Wright's talk — about how adults can better connect with young children — has been watched more than 50 million times. Now she's planning her next presentation.
21/12/2021.author: Heidi Sheehan

21/12/2021.headline: Philip has to undergo COVID-19 testing to attend cancer treatment, and it's wasting hours of his life
21/12/2021.description: Retired surgeon Philip Griffin has experienced the health system as both a cancer patient and as a doctor. As COVID-19 testing queues surge in South Australia, he's suggesting the current regime be expanded to allow the delivery of PCR tests via the mail.
21/12/2021.author: Sarah Mullins

21/12/2021.headline: 'Like a bar of gold': NSW residents scramble for precious rapid antigen tests
21/12/2021.description: A shortage of rapid antigen tests, particularly in Sydney, makes the humble product one of the most elusive buys in town.
21/12/2021.author: Heath Parkes-Hupton

21/12/2021.headline: This Perth bike shop sells stock as soon as it gets it, as supply shortages hinder Christmas trade
21/12/2021.description: Business confidence is up but supply issues and staff shortages continue to hinder the ability of Perth traders to meet demand from shoppers who are keen to splash their COVID savings over Christmas.
21/12/2021.author: Lucy Martin

21/12/2021.headline: It started as a 'crazy idea', but researchers think they've found a way to combat COVID using a common blood-thinner
21/12/2021.description: A trial of a nasal spray as a preventative treatment for COVID-19 will run for six months in Victoria. If it's a success, the spray could be distributed across the world.
21/12/2021.author: Bridget Rollason

21/12/2021.headline: The Matrix Resurrections: Catnip for stoners, academics, red-pill crackpots - and Keanu Reeves fans
21/12/2021.description: Keanu reunites with Carrie-Anne Moss and Lana Wachowski in an epic goof on the culture the original Matrix films inspired.
21/12/2021.author: Luke Goodsell

21/12/2021.headline: Why do we need booster shots, and why are there calls to bring them forward?
21/12/2021.description: The sharp increase in COVID-19 cases has prompted many people to call for an acceleration of the booster vaccination program. However, not everybody agrees that is a logical step.
21/12/2021.author: Penny Timms and Leonie Thorne

21/12/2021.headline: Queen Elizabeth II said 1992 was her 'annus horribilis', or horrible year. But could this year have rivalled it?
21/12/2021.description: It's been another turbulent year for the royal family, bring recollections of the Queen's speech in 1992 on her 'annus horribilis'. But this time, the challenges facing the monarchy are not only from within her household.
21/12/2021.author: Lucia Stein and Rebecca Armitage

21/12/2021.headline: 'Absolute disbelief': Mother offered zoo pass after disclosing daughter's allegations of sexual abuse to school
21/12/2021.description: A Tasmanian mother says the state's Education Department is more worried about damage control than it is about an allegation her daughter was abused by an older student.
21/12/2021.author: Emily Baker

21/12/2021.headline: When is it OK to take a rapid antigen test at home instead of lining up for a PCR swab?
21/12/2021.description: Now we have access to PCR tests and rapid antigen tests, which you can use at home. So which test should you use? And what's the difference?
21/12/2021.author: Emily Baker

21/12/2021.headline: Dubai's ruler ordered to pay 554 million pounds to settle custody battle
21/12/2021.description: The UK's High Court orders Dubai's leader, Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum, to pay more than $1.03 billion to settle a custody battle with his ex-wife over their two children.
21/12/2021.author: Emily Baker

21/12/2021.headline: Looting fears in typhoon-hit Philippines as food supplies begin to dry up
21/12/2021.description: The most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippine archipelago this year has left at least 375 dead and 50 others missing. Now survivors are running out of food.
21/12/2021.author: Emily Baker

21/12/2021.headline: 'World's biggest bug, at 50kg': Giant millipede fossil discovered by accident on UK beach
21/12/2021.description: A 50 kilogram millipede fossil is unearthed when a block of sandstone is crushed open at Northumberland, in England's north-east, revealing a meat-eating creature that was 2.5m long and lived more than 100 million years before the dinosaurs.
21/12/2021.author: Jason Dasey

21/12/2021.headline: SA MP facing 52 offences appearing to relate to accommodation allowance claims
21/12/2021.description: Independent South Australian state MP Troy Bell confirms to the ABC he is facing 52 charges and that he will "defend these allegations to the fullest extent".
21/12/2021.author: Nick Harmsen, Eugene Boisvert, and Patrick Martin

21/12/2021.headline: Christmas plans under threat for Territorians waiting 'days and days' for COVID test results after borders reopen
21/12/2021.description: Testing requirements linked to the ongoing outbreak and Monday's border changes have pushed out the wait for COVID test results in the NT, with the Health Minister declaring the timeframe is unacceptable.
21/12/2021.author: Isaac Nowroozi

21/12/2021.headline: New Zealand delays border reopening over Omicron concerns, holding back Australian travellers
21/12/2021.description: Non-quarantine travel for Australians will be pushed back from January 16 until the end of February, COVID-19 Response Minister Chris Hipkins tells media in Wellington.
21/12/2021.author: Isaac Nowroozi

22/12/2021.headline: Former professional cricketer Aaron Summers jailed for grooming young children
22/12/2021.description: The former Big Bash League player, who used social media to solicit sexually explicit material from children over several months, has been sentenced to at least two years in jail.
22/12/2021.author: Melissa Mackay

22/12/2021.headline: Family of David Gulpilil begin late actor's journey to 'dusty red carpet' of his Northern Territory homeland
22/12/2021.description: The body of great Yolngu actor David Gulpilil, who died last month aged 68, will be driven via hearse to Darwin, before his body is flown to north-east Arnhem Land to be met by more family members.
22/12/2021.author: Melissa Mackay

22/12/2021.headline: Live: Paul Gallen returns to the boxing ring against fellow former NRL pro Darcy Lussick
22/12/2021.description: Paul Gallen returns to the ring against fellow former NRL star Darcy Lussick, headlining a packed card of former rugby league men in the ring, as well as the professional debut of Olympic bronze medallist Harry Garside. Follow live.
22/12/2021.author: Simon Smale

22/12/2021.headline: Japan executes three death-row prisoners responsible for nine murders
22/12/2021.description: Japan has hanged three death-row inmates, its first executions in two years, amid growing criticism by human rights groups about the country's use of the death penalty.
22/12/2021.author: Simon Smale

22/12/2021.headline: Father-to-be who died in underworld hit was wrong target, police say
22/12/2021.description: NSW Police say the people responsible for gunning down Sydney man Mustapha Naaman in a Hurstville car park in January this year followed the wrong target to the car.
22/12/2021.author: Mark Reddie

22/12/2021.headline: Push to stop solar panels being dumped in landfills
22/12/2021.description: The race is on to establish a solar panel recycling industry before the renewable energy source's green credentials go to waste.
22/12/2021.author: Olivia Calver

22/12/2021.headline: The road to the 2022 NRL premiership runs through the Sydney Roosters
22/12/2021.description: After the year from hell, the Roosters are entering 2022 fully loaded and all most of the NRL can do to stop them is pray for mercy.
22/12/2021.author: Olivia Calver

22/12/2021.headline: Comet Leonard is wowing stargazers across Australia
22/12/2021.description: Comet Leonard is wowing stargazers across Australia, putting on a cracker of a show to brighten the end of the year.
22/12/2021.author: Genelle Weule

22/12/2021.headline: NT lockdowns extended in Tennant Creek and Ali Curung, mask order issued for Alice Springs
22/12/2021.description: A mask order will be in place in Alice Springs until at least 5pm on Christmas Eve, while interstate travellers will now be allowed to use rapid antigen tests instead of PCR tests to meet requirements after their arrival.
22/12/2021.author: Samantha Dick

22/12/2021.headline: WA to introduce mandatory booster jabs for some workers, as borders with entire country set to close
22/12/2021.description: More than a million WA workers will be required to get a third COVID vaccination as Premier Mark McGowan announces the state will close its borders to Tasmania and the Northern Territory from Boxing Day.
22/12/2021.author: Andrea Mayes

22/12/2021.headline: 'Profit over care': Inquiry finds 'unsafe' sleeping conditions at Sydney daycare contributed to death of infant
22/12/2021.description: An inquest into an infant who died at a Sydney family daycare finds he suffered from an undiagnosed heart condition but that "unsafe" sleeping conditions contributed to his death.
22/12/2021.author: Ursula Malone

22/12/2021.headline: Petition calls for leniency for Colorado truck driver sentenced to 110 years
22/12/2021.description: An online petition has gathered millions of signatures calling for leniency for a 26-year-old truck driver who was sentenced to 110 years in prison for vehicular homicide.
22/12/2021.author: Ursula Malone

22/12/2021.headline: 'I cried a river': Grandmother and grandson get new home, just in time for Christmas
22/12/2021.description: After eight years on the social housing waitlist, Aunty Donna and her young grandson are thrilled to be spending Christmas in their new home in Coffs Harbour.
22/12/2021.author: Claudia Jambor

22/12/2021.headline: National cabinet agrees to review interstate travel COVID testing requirements
22/12/2021.description: Prime Minister Scott Morrison says he wants to see vaccination rates return to the record high levels achieved in October and November, as Australia faces the Omicron variant.
22/12/2021.author: Jake Evans

22/12/2021.headline: Court fines director $30 million over failed Dunk Island dream
22/12/2021.description: A company developer with a dream to turn a small beachside town into Australia's next tourism mecca has been fined $30 million by the Federal Court.
22/12/2021.author: Kristy Sexton-McGrath

22/12/2021.headline: Adelaide man sentenced over violently shaking newborn baby
22/12/2021.description: An Adelaide man who threatened the life of his newborn baby daughter by violently shaking her has been jailed for five years. WARNING: This story contains graphic content that readers may find distressing.
22/12/2021.author: Claire Campbell

22/12/2021.headline: SA records 198 new COVID-19 cases amid concerns about exposure site delays
22/12/2021.description: South Australia has recorded 198 new cases of COVID-19 — another daily record for the state.
22/12/2021.author: Stacey Pestrin and Tom Fedorowytsch

22/12/2021.headline: 'It was clear to anyone on the day that they had incredible insight into what we were playing'
22/12/2021.description: The owner of the WNBL's Sydney Flames has blasted Basketball Australia and the Canberra Capitals in the wake of an integrity breach that saw both the Capital's coach and a referee suspended.
22/12/2021.author: Brett McKay and Selby Stewart

22/12/2021.headline: Melbourne City postpones games after six players test positive
22/12/2021.description: Defending A-League Men's champions Melbourne City are the latest Australian club to announce positive COVID-19 cases, prompting the postponement of three different matches across two competitions.
22/12/2021.author: Brett McKay and Selby Stewart

22/12/2021.headline: No clarity on Djokovic's vaccine status, but he wants to be at the Australian Open, says Tennis Australia boss
22/12/2021.description: Tennis Australia chief executive Craig Tiley says a small cohort of players and staff has been granted medical exemptions, but says he does not know if Novak Djokovic has requested one.
22/12/2021.author: Brett McKay and Selby Stewart

22/12/2021.headline: Human rights advocate to file complaint about Victorian venue
22/12/2021.description: A Victorian multicultural commissioner says he will file a human rights complaint against a beachside venue for discrimination after they refused him entry based on his clothing.
22/12/2021.author: Madi Chwasta

22/12/2021.headline: Perth mum who killed daughters in 'crime of passion' found not guilty of murder, but detained indefinitely
22/12/2021.description: A Perth mother who killed her two young daughters is detained indefinitely under Western Australia's "mentally impaired accused" laws after being found not guilty of murder due to "unsoundness of mind".
22/12/2021.author: Joanna Menagh

22/12/2021.headline: Gulf royals' divorce settlement pulls back curtain on lives of mega-wealthy
22/12/2021.description: The bitter custody battle between Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum and Princess Haya Bint Al Hussein has cost the publicity-shy Gulf royals more than the eye-watering sum decided by the court.
22/12/2021.author: Joanna Menagh

22/12/2021.headline: Victor Harbor's new causeway opens as demolition date nears for original
22/12/2021.description: Victor Harbor's new causeway officially opens in a ceremony alongside the existing heritage structure, which is flagged for demolition from February.
22/12/2021.author: Malcolm Sutton

22/12/2021.headline: A century of harvesting at Kooloongong
22/12/2021.description: Another harvest wraps up for the Murphy family at Kooloonong, in the hot and dry Victorian Mallee, but this is no ordinary year because these chickpeas represent the end of the family's 100th harvest.
22/12/2021.author: Kellie Hollingworth

22/12/2021.headline: Why there's more to this extravagant showcase than dramatic dips and gender-defying costumes
22/12/2021.description: The Alexander Ball is the culmination of what many performers in Brisbane's ballroom scene have been working towards for months and is a celebration of the strong community of LGBT people of colour that has been forged in the city's outer suburbs.
22/12/2021.author: Kellie Hollingworth

22/12/2021.headline: Hikes, picnics, Christmas outdoors: How our health experts suggest spending the holidays COVID-19 free
22/12/2021.description: Queensland frontline health workers are going beyond public health directions to protect themselves and their families from COVID-19's highly transmissible Omicron variant, as personal responsibility becomes the new mantra of the pandemic.
22/12/2021.author: Kellie Hollingworth

22/12/2021.headline: The 'weird' DIY technique to reduce stress
22/12/2021.description: Emotional Freedom Techniques, known as tapping, have been shown to help food cravings, depression, anxiety, phobias and post-traumatic stress disorder — and you can do it yourself.
22/12/2021.author: Kellie Hollingworth

22/12/2021.headline: Two years on from Australia's largest bushfire residents fear the next blaze
22/12/2021.description: Those who fought the Gospers Mountain fire, which burned for three months across New South Wales, reflect on the inferno two years later.
22/12/2021.author: Xanthe Gregory

22/12/2021.headline: Jackie could easily die from COVID. Here's what you can do to help her
22/12/2021.description: As COVID case numbers soar and border restrictions are set to relax, medically vulnerable Australians face the biggest risk to their lives so far.
22/12/2021.author: Rebecca Trigger and Anthony Pancia

22/12/2021.headline: Facebook page crowdsourcing COVID-19 exposure sites goes viral as SA Health defends 11-day delay
22/12/2021.description: A lag in the identification of COVID-19 exposure sites on the SA Health website prompts a social media group to take the matter into its own hands — already amassing more than 40,000 followers.
22/12/2021.author: Stacey Pestrin

22/12/2021.headline: 'There has to be a better way': Father-to-be, cancer patient caught up in Sydney's COVID-testing chaos
22/12/2021.description: The stories of an expectant father and a cancer patient caught up in Sydney’s COVID-19 testing delays show the human cost of the city’s escalating virus crisis.
22/12/2021.author: Heath Parkes-Hupton

22/12/2021.headline: Why a rising carbon credit price isn't exactly good news
22/12/2021.description: The price of Australian carbon credits is soaring. So this is a good thing, right? It would be if the regulator wasn't significantly boosting supply of carbon credits, writes David Taylor.
22/12/2021.author: David Taylor

22/12/2021.headline: Scalper bots play Grinch to gamers missing out on latest consoles this Christmas
22/12/2021.description: For many Australians hopeful to get their hands on the latest gaming console by December 25, it was always going to take more than a Christmas miracle.
22/12/2021.author: Sarah Motherwell

22/12/2021.headline: Putting the equity in equality: A-Leagues' Silver Lake funding could change the sport
22/12/2021.description: The A-Leagues are in their best financial position in their history after a string of multi-million-dollar partnerships. So where should the money go to truly grow the game?
22/12/2021.author: Samantha Lewis

22/12/2021.headline: Does the Omicron COVID-19 variant have different symptoms? Here's what we know
22/12/2021.description: With a new wave of infections, here's what you need to know about the virus and when you should get a COVID-19 test.
22/12/2021.author: Samantha Lewis

22/12/2021.headline: Philip Seymour Hoffman's son and a Haim sister star in new 70s California coming-of-age tale
22/12/2021.description: Paul Thomas Anderson’s Golden Globe-nominated dramedy Licorice Pizza combines the verve and sincerity of two newcomers with a sense of nostalgia and youthful optimism.
22/12/2021.author: Keva York

22/12/2021.headline: Have we stopped making great Christmas movies?
22/12/2021.description: There's a whole cinematic universe of cringey festive flicks populating streaming services. This new genre of Yuletide trash makes you wonder: Have we stopped making classic Christmas films?
22/12/2021.author: Jessica Riga

22/12/2021.headline: How this Facebook group started by Melbourne teens garnered millions of members and a TV series
22/12/2021.description: Subtle Asian Traits, an online space begun by young Chinese Australians to joke about being caught between two cultures, has become a place to talk about belonging and COVID-fueled anti-Asian racism.
22/12/2021.author: Hannah Reich

22/12/2021.headline: 'A difficult and lonely time' but these are the Christmas songs that bring familiar cheer
22/12/2021.description: Christmas can be a lonely culture shock. But these vocalists have recreated the sounds of Christmas in various languages from across the Asia-Pacific to give Australia's migrant communities a sense of homely celebration.
22/12/2021.author: Natasya Salim

22/12/2021.headline: Cancelled travel during COVID? You may not be entitled to a refund under consumer law
22/12/2021.description: As consumers, it can leave us angry when a travel company doesn't give us a refund or credit during COVID. But consumer law is far more complex than this, writes business reporter Emilia Terzon.
22/12/2021.author: Emilia Terzon

22/12/2021.headline: Exorcisms, shamans and 'corrective rape': The deadly risks of coming out in India
22/12/2021.description: When Sonia asked a court for protection, her sexuality was still illegal. But when another young couple did the same, they made history in India.
22/12/2021.author: Som Patidar and James Oaten

22/12/2021.headline: 'You could see its little hands': Researcher's chance sighting delights scientists
22/12/2021.description: A discovery made by a scientific researcher given the job of looking through hours of undersea camera footage has delighted scientists — a tiny handfish, not seen in the wild for 22 years.
22/12/2021.author: Kate Ainsworth

22/12/2021.headline: The three month gap for a double dose of AstraZeneca has also delayed a booster. Is Generation AZ at risk?
22/12/2021.description: Linda Fisher and her husband Ken are members of Generation AZ — the group of those aged over 60 who lined up for an AstraZeneca vaccine, the only one available to their age group for some time. But the three month delay between vaccine one and two has also pushed back their booster. Are they at risk?
22/12/2021.author: Catherine Taylor

22/12/2021.headline: Why smart people sometimes do stupid things
22/12/2021.description: Humanity has greater access to knowledge and expertise than any previous generation. And yet, people keep doing stupid things.
22/12/2021.author: Antony Funnell

22/12/2021.headline: NSW to bring back check-in codes, look at providing free rapid antigen tests
22/12/2021.description: NSW will reintroduce QR code check-ins and is set to provide free rapid antigen testing kits as it looks to stem the tide of the COVID-19 Omicron variant.
22/12/2021.author: Antony Funnell

22/12/2021.headline: Landslide hits Myanmar jade mine, killing at least one and trapping dozens
22/12/2021.description: Dozens are missing after earth and waste from several mines around Lonekhin village in Myanmar's Kachin state slide down a cliff, hitting miners.
22/12/2021.author: Antony Funnell

22/12/2021.headline: South Africa's Omicron surge may be receding, experts say
22/12/2021.description: South Africa's noticeable drop in new COVID-19 cases in recent days could signal the country's dramatic omicron-driven surge has passed its peak, according to medical experts.
22/12/2021.author: Antony Funnell

22/12/2021.headline: Dutch prosecutors demand life sentences for suspects accused of downing MH17
22/12/2021.description: Prosecutors says the four suspects recklessly used a Russian missile to bring down the passenger jet, killing all 298 passengers and crew, including 38 Australians.
22/12/2021.author: Antony Funnell

23/12/2021.headline: MP falsely claimed $54,000 by deceiving parliamentary staff, court documents allege
23/12/2021.description: An MP allegedly deceived staff at South Australia's Parliament House to make $54,000 in false claims for a taxpayer-funded allowance, court documents reveal.
23/12/2021.author: Patrick Martin and Olivia Mason

23/12/2021.headline: 'Canberra ripple breaks as a wave out here': $2m payout over work-for-the-dole racism claim
23/12/2021.description: Aboriginal communities in a remote region of central Western Australia had alleged the scheme breached the Racial Discrimination Act.
23/12/2021.author: Sean Tarek Goodwin

23/12/2021.headline: Intel issues apology after China threatens product boycott over company's Xianjiang supplier statement
23/12/2021.description: US chip maker Intel apologises to Chinese customers, partners and the public after a letter telling its suppliers not to source products or labour from the western region of Xinjiang caused a backlash.
23/12/2021.author: Sean Tarek Goodwin

23/12/2021.headline: Online Christmas shopping soars as Australia Post scrambles to deliver presents on time
23/12/2021.description: A record number of presents under the Christmas tree are likely to have been purchased online this year, as Australia Post scrambles to deliver more than 1 million parcels in Queensland this week.
23/12/2021.author: Melinda Howells

23/12/2021.headline: 'All is not calm, all is not bright': Many aged care residents face a lonely, isolated Christmas
23/12/2021.description: After two years of COVID restrictions and a royal commission exposing the terrible state of aged care in Australia, what will Christmas bring to our most vulnerable?
23/12/2021.author: Katherine Smyrk

23/12/2021.headline: Pharmacists, GPs can administer COVID-19 vaccines, but one gets paid less 'for the exact same job'
23/12/2021.description: Pharmacists are calling for funding equity between them and general practitioners who administer COVID-19 vaccinations, to help avoid workforce burnout and ensure Australia's immunisation schedule stays on track.
23/12/2021.author: Penny Timms

23/12/2021.headline: Federal government's $21 million Beetaloo Basin fracking grant ruled invalid, handling of legal challenge 'unreasonable'
23/12/2021.description: A federal court judge rules Resources Minister Keith Pitt's decision to award millions of dollars to a gas company to speed up exploration in the Northern Territory's Beetaloo Basin as invalid, following a legal challenge by the NT Environment Centre.
23/12/2021.author: Kate Ashton and Jacqueline Breen

23/12/2021.headline: England hold 'brutally honest' team meeting after 0-2 Ashes start
23/12/2021.description: The tourists are under pressure, with only Sir Don Bradman's Australian team of 1936-37 coming back to win the Ashes after losing the first two Tests.
23/12/2021.author: Kate Ashton and Jacqueline Breen

23/12/2021.headline: 'Pillar of Shame' Tiananmen Square commemoration sculpture removed in Hong Kong
23/12/2021.description: The artwork, of anguished human torsos, is one of the few remaining public memorials in the former British colony to remember the bloody crackdown that is a taboo topic in mainland China, where the killings cannot be publicly commemorated.
23/12/2021.author: Kate Ashton and Jacqueline Breen

23/12/2021.headline: WA records COVID case after arrival of French backpacker from Queensland
23/12/2021.description: Masks are mandatory in all indoor public venues and a range of festivals will be cancelled after a COVID-positive 25-year-old French backpacker has been out and about in Perth for almost two weeks.
23/12/2021.author: Jessica Warriner and James Carmody

23/12/2021.headline: SA records 484 new cases of COVID-19, man in his 30s on a ventilator
23/12/2021.description: South Australia records 484 new cases of COVID-19. Six adults and one child are in hospital. One man in his 30s is on a ventilator at the RAH's Intensive Care Unit.
23/12/2021.author: Stacey Pestrin

23/12/2021.headline: 'I've bin on a day out': Hilarious response to neighbour's request for a favour
23/12/2021.description: When a North Queensland man asked his neighbour to take the bin out for him, he got more than he expected.
23/12/2021.author: Tobi Loftus and Tegan Philpott

23/12/2021.headline: Refugees and asylum seekers evacuated after fires lit at Melbourne detention hotel
23/12/2021.description: Emergency crews attend after multiple fires were lit in a hotel detaining asylum seekers brought to Australia for medical treatment.
23/12/2021.author: Tobi Loftus and Tegan Philpott

23/12/2021.headline: China orders lockdown of up to 13 million people in northern city
23/12/2021.description: Authorities in China order 13 million people into lockdown in neighbourhoods and workplaces in the northern city of Xi'an after a localised outbreak of COVID-19.
23/12/2021.author: Tracey Shelton and Kai Feng

23/12/2021.headline: Health Minister says stable COVID-19 ICU cases 'heartening', despite Omicron explosion
23/12/2021.description: Health Minister Greg Hunt says that, despite the growth in COVID-19 cases, there has been no serious rise in patients on ventilators nor in ICU, calling that a "heartening" sign ahead of Christmas.
23/12/2021.author: Jake Evans and Georgia Hitch

23/12/2021.headline: Riverland arsonist eligible for parole in time for Christmas
23/12/2021.description: The man was sentenced to 15 months in prison for recklessly causing a bushfire on a total fire ban day.
23/12/2021.author: Claire Campbell

23/12/2021.headline: Double delight as bilby twins born in outback Queensland
23/12/2021.description: A pair of "shy" bilby twins emerge from their mother's pouch in an outback conservation project working to ensure the species' survival.
23/12/2021.author: Danielle O'Neal and Dan Prosser

23/12/2021.headline: Early COVID-19 studies suggest Omicron hospital risk less than Delta variant
23/12/2021.description: Early studies suggest people who contract the Omicron COVID-19 variant are far less likely to face severe illness and admission to hospital compared to the Delta strain.
23/12/2021.author: Danielle O'Neal and Dan Prosser

23/12/2021.headline: NT records five new local COVID-19 cases as Tennant Creek moves to a lockout
23/12/2021.description: The Northern Territory has recorded five new local cases of COVID-19 overnight, as Tennant Creek moves to a lockout and Ali Curung exits lockdown.
23/12/2021.author: Samantha Dick

23/12/2021.headline: Aged care home operators ordered to give evidence about deadly COVID-19 outbreak
23/12/2021.description: A Victorian judge will compel the former chairman and the nursing director of St Basil's aged care home to answer key questions about how they prepared and managed a COVID-19 outbreak, which ended in the deaths of 50 residents last year.
23/12/2021.author: Kristian Silva

23/12/2021.headline: Queensland universities release more than 16,000 offers to prospective students
23/12/2021.description: As thousands of future Queensland university students receive an early offer today, the most popular courses for 2022 are revealed.
23/12/2021.author: Antonia O'Flaherty

23/12/2021.headline: Winemakers left sweating over shortage of key ingredient
23/12/2021.description: Winemakers in Australia are scrambling to source a crucial component for the fermentation process as Chinese export restrictions continue to cause global shortages.
23/12/2021.author: Hugh Hogan

23/12/2021.headline: Queensland takes big stick to black jewfish black market, but is it working?
23/12/2021.description: The black jewfish was traditionally caught purely for its taste, but five years ago it became marine gold when its swim bladder drew high demand from the Asian medicinal black market.
23/12/2021.author: Inga Stünzner

23/12/2021.headline: Harris keeps spot as Langer throws his support behind the struggling opener
23/12/2021.description: Marcus Harris's spot in Australia's Ashes team has been in the spotlight since his latest poor turn in Adelaide but he still has coach Justin Langer's support.
23/12/2021.author: Inga Stünzner

23/12/2021.headline: First Proud Boys member pleads guilty to January 6 riots in US Capitol
23/12/2021.description: Matthew Greene is the first Proud Boys member to publicly plead guilty to conspiring with other members to stop Congress from certifying the Electoral College vote.
23/12/2021.author: Inga Stünzner

23/12/2021.headline: 'You wouldn't have a party in here': Boof watches for smoke in his fire tower the size of two toilet cubicles
23/12/2021.description: Eye-in-the-sky satellites can detect fires but lone spotters working in Tasmania's fire towers are essential for spying smoke and calling in bushfires early.
23/12/2021.author: Georgie Burgess

23/12/2021.headline: Ex-Minnesota police officer found guilty of manslaughter in shooting of Daunte Wright
23/12/2021.description: Kim Potter is found guilty of manslaughter after fatally shooting black man Daunte Wright during a traffic stop.
23/12/2021.author: Georgie Burgess

23/12/2021.headline: US authorities approve Merck's COVID-19 pill molnupiravir
23/12/2021.description: The pill's ability to head off severe COVID-19 is much smaller than initially announced and the drug label will warn of serious safety issues, including the potential for birth defects.
23/12/2021.author: Georgie Burgess

23/12/2021.headline: COVID puts dent in Christmas revenue for fruit and veg wholesalers
23/12/2021.description: It was shaping up as a bumper Christmas for fresh food wholesalers at the Sydney Markets, but the resurgent virus has seen demand for fresh produce taper off.
23/12/2021.author: David Claughton

23/12/2021.headline: How to watch — and enjoy — the Sydney to Hobart yacht race
23/12/2021.description: Dismissed by some as "rich people and their toy boats", the Sydney to Hobart yacht race is actually a gruelling test of skill, teamwork and boat design. Here's a guide on how to watch, and enjoy, the event this Boxing Day.
23/12/2021.author: James Dunlevie and Chris Rowbottom

23/12/2021.headline: Young people drink less alcohol than their parents. Here are four reasons why
